attributes.action: reverse the funding cuts by the STFC for E-merlin which may lead to the closure of Jodrell Bank
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This is a world class facility which does leading edge science. For the sake of 2.5 Million for funding the e-Merlin project a whole class of science where Britain actually does lead the world is endangered.

The e-Merlin project is fundamental to maintaining the expertise to link Radio telescopes across wide areas. This has already enabled unprecedented resolution in our radio exploration of the Universe and we are on the cusp of extending this even further. This is fundamental science of the most important kind
